mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, birth, memberid, nickname, email, phone, gender) VALUES (#{userName},#{birth},#{memberId},#{nickName},#{email},#{phone},#{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT user.memberid, nickname, birth, email, phone, passwd, grade, active, username, type, point, leved, gender FROM user LEFT OUTER JOIN member ON user.memberid = member.memberid WHERE user.memberid = #{memberId} AND user.passwd = #{passwd} AND leved = false
SELECT * FROM member WHERE memberid=#{memberId} AND email=#{email}
